snippet: A year after sustaining a season-ending injury shagging flies in the outfield in Kansas City, Mariano Rivera plans to revisit the scene and talk with the people who assisted him that night.
abstract: A year after sustaining a season-ending injury shagging flies in the outfield in Kansas City, Mariano Rivera plans to revisit the scene and talk with the people who assisted him that night.

headline.main: Rivera Returning to Scene of His Injury
